text: Curio muirii is a succulent plant in the daisy family that is native to South Africa. 2001\. TDGW â€“ World Geographical Scheme for Recording Plant Distributions, 2nd Edition Its particular native range is the Cape Province. == Description == A small shrub that grows in shale cliffs,Senecio muirii by Operation Wildflower.org it features hairless leaves that are pale green with blue tones. The leaves are flat and circular-shaped.Senecio muirii leaves by Operation Wildflower.org == References == Category:Asteraceae
title: Curio muirii
